title: Drawing, "Design for Tall Side Table, with Side View", 1934
medium: Graphite, color pencil on tracing paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Tall side table on base consisting of lower section showing two openings for books.  Upper section shows a tall conical element rising through the center of two tiered shelf.  Sketch of elevation below drawing. Dimensions throughout.
